# Image Captions for Butcher Training Data
#
# Format: filename<TAB>caption
#
# This file will be automatically generated when you run:
# python scripts/prepare_training_data.py --input photos --output training/butcher/images
#
# Example entries:
# butcher_0001.png	a photo of sks dog, french bulldog
# butcher_0002.png	a photo of sks dog, french bulldog, happy expression
# butcher_0003.png	a photo of sks dog, french bulldog, sitting
#
# You can manually edit captions to add more specific descriptions
